title: Wild Flag, Live From The Black Cat In Washington, D.C.
description: Wild Flag has only been together for about a year, and just released its debut album last month. But the group has already earned a reputation for stunning, frenetic live performances. Wild Flag's members play with near-total abandon, thrashing on stage to bursts of guitar noise and fierce rhythms.  This performance was recorded live at the Black Cat in Washington, D.C. on Oct. 20, 2011.
